note.p: Death: Great George Street, Westminster (19 April 1794)

Career: Lieutenant, Saxon Grenadiers (1749-1757); joined British Army, Captain 42nd Highlanders (1757); Colonel, 77th (Atholl) Highlanders (1777-1783); Major-General (1782); MP for Perth (1773-1777, 1774-1780, 1784-his death)
Notes: The DNB entry for a 'James Murray' does not, according to DNB itself, correspond with this James Murray, even although DNB is cited as a source in index to BR.
